Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1941 affecting package protobuf for versions less than 25.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-1941 affecting package protobuf for versions less than 25.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package protobuf is earlier than 25.3-1, affected by CVE-2022-1941
